content.detailedDescription: The kids and i were standing on the front porch, they asked what the light in the sky was i told them it was a ufo didnt behave like a plane or helicopter. we watched it for about 10  min . it became very bright, could hardly look directly at it. then the bright light went off, it turned quickly to the north, left the area. as it left we could see the shape. its hard to explain. my son tried getting pictures on his phone but it was already too full of pics., wouldnt let him get pictures.  the girls hoped it would land  to meet them. . they were excited. the ufo returned to the same place and hovered again til a plane showed up. . planes, helicopters were all over the area for about an hour afterwards. i've gotten used to seeing the crafts, orbs. i figured i'll start reporting them. so people can see that their not out to harm us.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was hovering, lights brightened, brightest light turned off turned quockly , took off. returned and hovered again.

content.detailedDescription: Was in backyard when saw two blinking lights almost in the shape of a humanoid. was east of my location in san diego county. hovering around at around 1500-2000 ft. airplane got near by it from take off from lindbergh field. ufo moved closer to plane. i tried reaching out to it with my mind and it hid behind a thick cloud deck. could not be observed again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two blinking lights hovering and moving around

content.detailedDescription: We looking at the stars and having fun trying to look at ufos then we started to see objects move around us then their watchers around us then we all saw the same thing. small form moving around us then we saw light flashing in sink an object then the object came in then landed an watched it for 40 mins before we knew they werent going to leave so we left.
content.summary: We did a telepathic message then we a saw group of flashing lights. then lights moving around us an closer too us .We had shadows around us moving. then we saw the craft apear an land that we as  land at differnet stages.

content.detailedDescription: In the sky by 84th and highway 75 seen a green ball then started to move very fast like a shooting star towards earth. it was miles in the sky dropping for a good 10 sec's looking like it was passing earth or the edge of earth. i'v seen shooting stars when hunting and camping this was not one. this was a huge green ball of light moving very fast with a trail.
content.summary: Green ball in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends farm and we were outside having a cigarette, my friend pointed to a light in the sky off to the east and asked |what is that?" i told him that i thought it might be a planet, from that distance it looked like mars (a flashing reddish colour). i watched the light in the sky and noticed that it was moving. as it came closer to us, i could hear coyotes start to howl in that direction. i sent welcoming thoughts to it. i ran through the house to see if i could get a better look from the back deck. the object had moved considerably closer and was well above the tallest trees distance from the ground. i could not see the exact shape but there were lights that were flashing on it, they seemed to be around the bottom of the object. it hovered as it moved and i could not hear any sounds coming from it. and then the most amazing thing happened. it started to ascend and the lights became much more intense. it ascended to a very high altitude and when it reached its stopping point, it starting moving in a straight line going east. it was very high up and i could see it as a blinking white light until it was out of sight.
content.summary: My friend pointed out a light in the sky and as we watched it, we realized that it was moving, it moved towards us and then it ascending quickly

content.detailedDescription: Was working outside at about 6:40-6:45 pm tonight (10/17/2014)  saw a bright yellow star like object in the sky.  was curious so watched it and after a few seconds it died out like a candle flame then came back very bright again almost as soon as it vanished but in a different location.  did this for 3 or 4 minutes and then did not see it again.  think it was in southwest direction but not sure will check tomorrow in the light. i pointed it out to my father who always has an explanation for things and he said "that surely was not a jet!"  then withing a couple minutes of object vanishing we heard a loud jet or jets, but could never actually see the jets possibly because of the tree line.  i saw a report also from maine on the same thing tonight and was interested exactly where that was because sounds like the same thing i saw.
content.summary: West paris maine bright yellowish light star like.  in on spot in sky few seconds, dims out like a candle the reappears in another location almost immediately.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from gym with father when and both saw this. odd events happening in macungie and i think i am being visited
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Driving home from gym and saw what looker like triangle ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside and out of nowhere three objects appeared in the sky straight ahead. looked like fireworks at first, but then i realized they were objects, descending steadily but slowly. then a fourth appeared and as the the others just disappeared, the fourth stopped mid air and mad a zig zag path down until it disappeared as well. cannot explain it any better, and the video i shot is not clear enough to see the sparks or objects, just the light
content.summary: Four objects with sparks of some sort shooting out back; descended, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Having a bonfire about 7pm, some stars were out already. bright light caught my eye in the south sky. it just appeared out if no where. this was the brightest thing i've ever seen in the sky. stayed lit up and sationary for about four seconds. suddenly it went out and jumped to the left, then down , then to the right, lighting up every time it reapeared. then the distance of jumps it made became further away and hard to follow. very erratic . i tryed to time the lights when i saw them, sometimes would be just a flash, other times it would stay lit for 5-7 seconds. it moved east  and west mostly but continued south when it left the area. just a few minutes later what i assumed was jets circled the area were the craft had been. the whole incident creeped me out..
content.summary: Bright light moving fast and erratic

content.detailedDescription: Family went out to dinner and while walking into restaurant my daughter said "dad, what is that?" and pointed up. i didn't know what it was so i took a video of it.
content.summary: Saw something that wasn't moving. have video.

content.detailedDescription: 6:10 am  n/w almost straight up an object moved at a high rate of speed. stopped then moved in a different direction and stopped again. this occurred three times before out of site. the distance in the sky the object moved  in comparison to the height of the object was at least several hundred miles if not further. the object had to be moving over 5000 mph. this is no joke. i know there is no craft humans have built that can move like this. ? cool.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Miles high moved fast changed.  direction stopped and started three times traveled  at least  5000 +  m p h

content.detailedDescription: Trimming shrubs at a customers house with my wife and another couple. i was looking up and the shrub blocked the sun so i could see the object very near it. it was a clear sky, no clouds . as long as we held something up to block the sun the object was very bright and easy to see. the object was not moving noticeably but did stay about the same distance from the sun for over an hour. i was wondering if it could be a planet or star . ive  seen the moon during the day but never a star or planet. we went for a quick bite at close to noon and the object was gone when we came out. the object was bigger than stars you would see at night and was very shiny, almost chrome like.
content.summary: Bright object near sun for over an hour not moving, then gone

content.detailedDescription: My older brother and i were heading out of san antonio to spend the night hunting for snakes northwest of del rio tx. we were approximately 10-20 east of del rio heading westbound on hwy 90. we usually try to make it out there earlier in the evening because we like to watch the airplanes doing touch & go's at laughlin air force base. this particular night we got a late start so it was already dark before we got there. as i could see the shine in the night of the city of del rio off in the distance i knew we were close to laughlin afb. my brother and i had been listening and laughing along with the satelite radio comedy station and weren't really conversing about anything for a few moments. he was driving and i was sitting shotgun. a light above laughlin afb caught my attention. it was a very bright green light. kind of liike an led bulb. it didnt seem to emit a lot of light either, much like an led. as i looked at it all these thought ran through my head. hmmm, thats awfully tall for a cell phone tower? wow its really bright for being so far away. i'm surprised they would have such a tall tower next to an airfield with so many planes buzzing around. i've never seen a green bulb like that on a tower... before i could lift a finger to point it out to my brother the object darted across the sky so fast that it went from my 8 o'clock to my 1 o'clock in the blink of an eye. all while being several miles away. i figured it traveled about 15-20 miles in less than half a second. after the object darted across the sky and stopped in an instant, it sat in the same spot for about 5-10 seconds and then light slowly faded out and the object was no longer visible. my brother and i immediatly looked at each other and simultaneously said,"did you just see that?"  all these years i figured it was some kind of military experiment. i finally decided that if it wasnt military property then someone should be made aware of what we saw...
content.summary: Very bright but consentrated green light sat in sky for about 2-3 minutes, darted northward faster than my eyes could follow, stopped on a dime, hovered for a couple seconds, then slowly faded out...

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my morning walk at the park. at the farthest end of the park i looked s/e at the sky to enjoy the morning. i saw what i thought was a plane in the distance. as i was walking east bound in the park i noticed the object wasn't moving like a plane. so i watched it as i continued my walk. when i got to the closes point of the craft i noticed it was hovering about 1000 to 2000 feet about a half mile away above the park. i stopped to observed and realized this was not plane. it was jet black and shaped like a boomerang. no lights and no noise. it bigger than a large plane. it rotated at about 2 revolutions a minute again clockwise. i stood there for about 2 minutes watching it. my cell phone was in my truck. i was about 50 yards from my truck. so i turned to walk to my truck and took my eyes off the object. it took about a minute to walk to my truck. when i got there i looked up and it was gone. no noise, no trail, it had just vanished. that made me realize this was not manmade here on earth. let me add that this did not look like a stealth plane. it really looked like a large boomarange. i'm sorry i didn't have any video or pictures. let me also say i am a beliver that we are not the only creatures in this universe. i wasn't scared.... just amazed that i acutally saw what i would consider and ufo..... not from this earth.
content.summary: Ufo hovered and rotated slowy clockwise. large balck boomerang ship.

content.detailedDescription: I have taken over 8000 pics from a wildlife camera at this site.I noticed the object when viewing animals.It seems to be about 10 to 15ft off the ground.The deer in the photo seems to see or hear object also.The object was not in the next photo.I have also have a photo of a head in another wildlife pic taken in 2010. it looks like a enity of some kind.Also in june of 2014 i had a 15ft circle in my front yard.The grass was dark green 12 inches wide around the outside edge of the circle and lighter in center.
content.summary: Wildlife camera took pics of object.Over 8000 pics from site and nothing like this

content.detailedDescription:
It was just after 9pm, thursday 10/16/14; my son and i were outside playing in the backyard of our home jumping on a trampoline... we always pay attention to the air traffic, especially in our neighborhood. by now, we are pretty skilled at how to look and rule out possible known crafts and their characteristics. we see all sorts of known crafts and lights over here... (military, private, commercial, tourist, blimp, fireworks, search lights, etc.) this was not like any of them! 

i recall noticing these two red orbs very prominent in my peripheral view in the north-east direction of the sky... but initially discounting them as regular air traffic (as we have so much) and i was focused on my boy. also during this time and sporadically, we saw many other craft such as airplanes & helicopters. the sky was mostly clear with a tiny bit of light haze in some parts of the higher horizon... however, they were not in the haze part of the sky. we could verify this against the look of the identified crafts we saw traveling through and all around during and after the events. 

the two red orbs were staggered and one appeared slightly brighter than the other. they did not appear to 'fly in' towards us... they were 'just there'... may have traveled slowly toward us a bit, traveled east a bit? turning?... then slowly faded away... the whole time pulsating, (not blinking) there was no pattern and no sets of running/safety lights as other craft have. 

there were no clouds for them to "disappear from our view"... they literally vanished and reappeared a short time again, doing this three times!

as my son and i are witnessing this we were yelling for dad to "come quick and bring a camera!" we were all so very excited and grateful to witness this event. we continued expressing our excitement/gratitude and tried 'calling' them back... thus we kept watching in hopes they would reappear... and they did! two more times! =) ...And did the same things. we felt only positive feelings and excitement.

i tried to capture it on video but it proved challenging... (so sorry about that but at least its something)... and i was very much enamored with what i was watching... the tiny bit of video is nothing compared to what we physically saw in person and this lasted for at least a good 20 minutes off and on. (9:15pm/pdt to about 9:25pm/pdt)

initially i was still standing on the trampoline...But then hopped off to try to steady it. as i would zoom in, the camera would lose focus but in person they were very prominent yet translucent as well. at times when i zoomed in on the object it seems to disappear though the camera view but viewing it physically with our eyes, it was still there... then slowly faded out.

i used my (fairly current model) sony digital hd camera... in comparison it seems our cell phones have taken better footage than this. not sure what my settings are on but i will check that out and fix for the next potential event. looks like its only hd for stills.?

i know what i saw... and...I know what it wasn't... this was a ufo event! i wish you all could see the entire event as we did. i will do my best to get some better footage the next time as we are definitely not alone here.

eyes open - look up & share people! try to capture footage the best you can and share share share <3 <3 <3 onward & upward <3 <3 <3
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two staggered, very prominent red pulsating orbs: did not seem to 'fly in from a distance', they just appeared, hovered, may have traveled a bit turned on a short path before disappearing. this repeated 3 times in a half hours time.

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was driving my bike during night .
2)as it was night time so this ufo just catched my sight .
3)i thought it was a plane .
4) this object was hovering above the building and  when i looked at it , i just stopped my bike and it was not moving it was just hovering and after few minutes it just diminished slowly .
5) i always have believed in ufos but never watched but this was my first experience .
6)as i started my bike and i was maintaining eye contact with that object and after few minutes it slowly diminished .
content.summary: Red sphere object   hovering  above building at night

content.detailedDescription:
Fiery trail of light

in the early hours of wednesday, october 15, 2014 at 12:06 a.M. i was looking at some various lights that had been moving but not able to capture on film.   i was using my binoculars, and placed them down for a moment, only to notice the last full second or so of a fiery bright yellow/orange trail of light that dove at about an 80 degree steep slope directly into the blue springs lake.   

it would have entered at about direct north, or 360 degrees direction.   depending on its distance away, there would have been many places in the lake that it could have entered.  but since there is a building accumulation of nearly exact location headings that have been accumulating since may, my estimate places it at about a mile from my observation point at home.   the magnitude of brightness was at least 
-10.  this means that it was as bright as a half moon. the frequency of such sightings is once in 2 years.   

this now makes the third object of a “meteor” like nature in 6 months.  however, all of the meteors that i have seen over the years are extremely brief flashes across the sky.  none have taken 2 seconds or more in their flight that i have observed…   the trajectories of all three that i have seen since may have gone to the same place within yards of each other.  the statistical probability of this occurring in the same spot on earth is so high that it defies calculation.   from the vantage point of entry from my observation point however, the odds would be 36,663.85 x 1064 to 1.

most meteors burn and are visible very briefly as the air molecules ionize.   they occur 
high in the meteoric area of the atmosphere.  this region is at altitudes higher than 65 miles.  
another item:   very bright meteors do not reach below 9-12 miles of altitude as their fragments decelerate and are no longer visible if they reach the ground.  therefore, what i have witnessed three times now, including this last one, were not meteors.

within 2-3 minutes, two planes headed directly toward the same spot.  one overflew the blue springs lake and the other on a parallel and slightly tangential course just to the western side of the lake.  neither plane was seen to return after flying over.

the attached photo is a file photo of the precise location of the occurrence, although it was at night.  the line shows the steep angle and location.
content.summary: Fiery trail of light

content.detailedDescription: On october 17th, 2014 at aproximately 3:24pm. in ridgewood, ny i was driving sw on myrtle ave on a clear sunny day i happen to look up and thought i saw a commercial plane traveling west. however upon further visual examination, i noticed that the "commercial aircraft" had no tail nose or wings. it was chrome and oval in shape. gave off somewhat of a glare. i only saw this anomaly under a minute, before as it was reaching a cloud it vanished. i looked up as i drove before realizing it wasn't safe, i pulled over waiting to see the "plane" come out the other end of the cloud, but never did. i looked up and couldn't see any other clouds, planes birds, anything.  it was clear and sunny about 72°.
content.summary: Looked up at sunny sky, saw chrome ufo then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription: On october 17th, 2014 at aproximately 3:24pm. in ridgewood, ny i was driving sw on myrtle ave on a clear sunny day i happen to look up and thought i saw a commercial plane traveling west. however upon further visual examination, i noticed that the "commercial aircraft" had no tail nose or wings. it was chrome and oval in shape. gave off somewhat of a glare. i only saw this anomaly under a minute, before as it was reaching a cloud it vanished. i looked up as i drove before realizing it wasn't safe, i pulled over waiting to see the "plane" come out the other end of the cloud, but never did. i looked up and couldn't see any other clouds, planes birds, anything.  it was clear and sunny about 72°.
content.summary: Looked up at sunny sky, saw chrome ufo then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Rapidly morphing craft


sunday night october 5, 2014 at 10:55 pm, i noticed a light moving slowly over the woods behind our house at about 348°, roughly nnw.  i recorded a video 14 seconds long and attempted some stills.  when i played it back later, i saw that the images showed two lights moving together most of the time.  but, occasionally they changed into three, or even just one.  there were also occasional bursts of a reddish orange light, or pulse of energy.

the craft is nothing ordinary.   there is no chance of it being any type of human craft that i am aware of.  since i was standing and holding the camera, the images were jumping all over the screen but the video still was able to capture sufficient detail to see what was going on.  

the images that are attached show 10 subsequent frames from a portion of 1/3 of a second of video.  during the time, the craft changes its shape constantly.  this just gives an idea of what was occurring during the entire time that i filmed it, and i must assume that it was doing the same prior and subsequently to my filming the event.  

this morphing nature, and even the colors were not evident to the naked eye, or even initial review of the video.  only when i had a chance to separate out individual frames, and to edit the content of the images to enhance the faint images that we see the true nature of what was going on.

i also attach a series of six images of what appear to be pulses of energy, or light.   they occur very regularly, at precisely 1.23 seconds apart.

shortly after i finished filming the event, the light vanished from the sky.
content.summary: Rapidly morphing craft

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed around midnight doodling on my phone. i was laying on my back and happened to look through my window/skylight near my ceiling, as i do every night. i noticed a yellowish/orange starlike object that seemed much brighter than the usual star. i watched it closely for 20-30 minutes and it always seemed like it was moving very slightly. i have no clue how far it was since it was a tad bit bigger than the usual star. also, it almost seemed like it would change forms very slightly. at times, it didn't exactly look like a orb/star anymore. it would almost look as if it was slightly shifting shapes, yet still had the orb-like star shape. i kept checking my vision over and over because i wasn't believing my eyes. every time i looked, i always noticed it was slightly moving around in a circular motion. hardly noticeable, but still noticeable. another reason i believe that it wasn't a star, is the fact that it was flickering more than any other star i've ever seen. it was a calm flicker and much brighter than the average star. as well as a little bit fatter looking, but still small from my view. after about 30 minutes of the same thing, i went back to my phone and would glimpse back once in awhile to see if it ever moved. about an hour later, i was ready to go to sleep finally but decided to watch it more because of my curiosity. after about 20 to 30 more minutes of staring at it non stop, it jolted upwards stopping much higher in the sky. it moved extremely fast. just shot up higher in the sky and faded to practically nothing. the light fully deteriorated after it stopped moving. i don't know what in the world it was. i've never seen anything like this happen before. i'm mind boggled.
content.summary: Very strange starlike object

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were doing laundry at a laundry mat at 35th avenue & glendale ave. about 1:30pm on oct. 16, 2014 when we noticed a cluster of about 7 white floating dots that had the appearance of stars or planets in the sky that did not fit the pattern of movement of any star or planet or fit nay physical description of any plane, man made flying object or flying animal known to this earth. it was very weird the way they moved from a stationary position to a very slow horizontal movement then to a slow moving vertical and then back to a stationary/hovering position with bout 6 other white floating dots around the main dot with patterns of movement seen with purpose and non-random intelligence.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cluster of about 7 white floating dots in the sky that did not fit the pattern of movement or physical description of any plane, man made flying object, planet, star or flying animal known to this earth.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving for work and walking out to my truck when i noticed
a very bright light that was traveling in an arcing motion from left to right. at first sight i thought it was maybe a rocket because of the cone shaped light coming out of the back end (like a smoky mist). as i watched it travelled nw in an arcing motion. seamed to pulse a brighter light a couple times and then accelerated and took off out of sight. 
my feeling afterwards was that i would really like to know what that was....
this incident was reported by others in our county and broadcast on the local news.
content.summary: Cone shapped arc light in sky

content.detailedDescription: I start opening at 0615hrs mon-fri and while opening the back gate of my place of work i herd a dog barking not that i have not herd it before but there was something different about the dog it would bark then whine it cased me to look in that direction not seeing the dog i panned back toward the gate my eyes caught what looked like the stars rolling it took a second for my eyes to adjust to what i was seeing ....This is harder than i thought to say but i saw a huge circle black as the night the stars could be seen through it and on the sides they would role "the stars" giving away its shape it looked huge and not very far away the rolling stars on its edges showed it slowly moving south west and upward i pulled my phone out and tried to film it but could not activate the camera when i looked back at it was gone i mean from around 100 feet to gone i wanted to say something to my coworkers but its hard even now to tell what i saw i know it was huge reflected stars through it but not anything under it like street lights you could see it was round for as it moved stars would role like a moving mirror
content.summary: Was opening gate and saw object

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside my house talking to my girlfriend on the phone and telling her how beautiful the night was and how clear the sky was. i first saw a light that looked like a plane in the distance. i live under the flight pass of airplanes coming to tampa so i thought it was a plane. then as i was looking at the stars and telling my girlfriend that i thought i have found a constellation on the sky but wasn't sure which it was, i started drifting my sight to the right, and then i saw it, there was a boomerang/arch looking white something on the sky. also at first i thought it was a cloud, but it was moving extremely fast in the sky. at this point i became speechless, for a good 5 seconds, then i tried to describe what was happening to my girlfriend and couldn't express it. then i realized that the first light that i saw was actually following the object. it look to me like an arch looking cloud was being pushed really fast by an invisible object and the cloud was not dissipating or disappearing. it was just going extremely fast. the light that i saw was at least 1/4 to 1/2 a mile behind it. then the bigger one, the arch looking one, turned to the south, and so did the light following it, at simple sight i would say they were 3 or 4 miles away, and within seconds they dissipated in the sky. both of them. i was clueless on what it was. i was like, wait and tried to make sense out of it, and briefly went back to explain it to my girlfriend, but i couldn't really put it into words over the phone, so i told her i would tell her today.

it was about 11 pm, in holiday fl 34690
content.summary: Arch/boomerang shaped. with a redish white light following it from 1/4 to 1/2 mile away.

content.detailedDescription: It all started when i had wanted to try out my new telescope. my mother and i had set it up on the back of my mother car. we were looking at the stars then we heard loud humming sound.We looked up saw this large craft come to rest over our heads. it blocked out the sky. i don't it seemed time had stopped and it was moving away. my ankle started to hurt. to this day i still have the scar on my left ankle. i was 13 when this happened
content.summary: Large triangular ufo mothership

content.detailedDescription: I was picking up a friend in daytona beach and as we both walked to the car i happened to look up.  upon looking up i saw a disk shaped glowing yellowish/orange with a dark circle in the middle.  i was in awe as i saw it hovering which didn't seem more than 1000 ft above!  i was so much in awe i didn't even point it out to my friend.  when i first saw it i though maybe it was ball lightning.  but after it took off at a incredible speed seeming to elevate i knew it wasn't ball lightning!  i did extensive research on ball lightning after my sighting to be sure.  after researching it i am positive it was not ball lightning!  as far as the objects movements, it hovered for about ten seconds and took off in the blink of and eye!  i did not blink though!  it made no noise and upon its ne take-off all i saw was a yellow streak.  that is when i lost site of the object.
content.summary: Yellowish/orange disk shaped that hoovered for 10secs and seemed to elevate as it accelerated at unbelievable speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking photos of the sunrise early in the morning. the location was on the 20th floor of an apartment building looking roughly ne approx. 15mi. towards the toronto downtown skyline.

after taking several photos i noticed that 1 of them had an unusual silvery disk beside the cn tower in toronto. this is an area in downtown toronto near to the island (billy bishop) airport. small planes would fly by on a regular basis. after checking my photos taken of the skyline, this is the only image with the suspicious object.

however, given the shutter speed of 1/4s that was used, a plane flying would be recorded as a short line across the sky. the object that was captured appeared to be stationary. was it a plane? an airship?   i've never seen a weather balloon in this area so i don't think it was a balloon.

the first image was the original that came out of my digital camera with no computer touchup or enhancement. the second is a copy of the first with an arrow added to show where the suspicious object was. since the object was only seen for such as short duration, there is a possibility the object may be a helicopter that remained stationary for a short time and then took off. at this point i don't want to jump into 1 conclusion until i get other opinions.
content.summary: Sighting over toronto skyline

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in the kitchen about to grab a bowl of ice cream, and i went to the sink with the ice cream for no reason, i never did that before, and i looked out the window into my backyard. it was around 8:00pm and it was quite dark. there were no clouds in the sky. being an astronomy fanatic i love looking at the stars and pointing out constallations, bur what i saw that night wasn't normal. at first i saw a blue-white light the size of a star, but then it got brighter and started moving eratically. up down back forward diagonal. it got brighter until it came to be so close to my house that i could see the shape of the ufo quite clearly. it was dark grey and black,and had 3 lights. it was triangular in shape and the lights were on each point. after swooping close to my house it turned back to the sky and became bright as a star again, and still moving frantically until it moved farther and farther away and i couldn't see it anymore. i stood there in awe not believing what i had just witnessed. as soon as i snapped back to reality i called one of my friends and told her the story.
content.summary: At first there was a light, then it started moving eratocally in the sky, and it came closer to where i was and i could make out the ufo.
